sxmlc
Simple XML parser in C
Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
 C_DataSourceBufferBuffer data source used by 'read_line_alloc' when required. 'buf' should be 0-terminated
 C_DOM_through_SAXSet of SAX callbacks used by XMLDoc_parse_file_DOM()
 C_SAX_CallbacksUser callbacks used for SAX parsing
 C_SAX_DataStructure given as an argument for SAX callbacks to retrieve information about parsing status
 C_TagDefinition of "special" tags such as "&lt;? ?&gt;" or "&lt;![CDATA[ ]]/&gt;"
 C_XMLAttributeAn XML attribute in the form name="value"
 C_XMLDocAn XML document, basically an array of XMLNode
 C_XMLNodeAn XML node
 C_XMLSearchXML search parameters. Can be initialized from an XPath string
